about_the_game:
LUNA The Shadow Dust - The Art Book is a 124 pages PDF including both the full color HD original game artwork and the artist’s hand-drawn sketches. It is like going ‘backstage’ with the game and serves as a ‘visual record’ of our journey from the very beginning towards release. We hope leafing through the design notes, concept art and drawings within this book will bring you more delight and understanding about the world of LUNA.

The Art Book contains both plot and puzzle-related spoilers. In order to enjoy the game to the fullest, we highly recommend you read through the Art Book AFTER playing the game!

We sincerely thank you for your love and support!

The Art Book contains both plot and puzzle-related spoilers. In order to enjoy the game to the fullest, we highly recommend you read through the Art Book AFTER playing the game!
